title: Stade Municipal (Yverdon)
text:
Stade Municipal is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Yverdon-les-Bains">Yverdon-les-Bains</a>, <a href="Switzerland">Switzerland</a>. It is used mostly for <a href="Association%20football">football</a> matches and is the home ground of <a href="Yverdon-Sport%20FC">Yverdon-Sport FC</a> and has a capacity of 6,600. The stadium has 1,000 seats and 5,600 standing places.
It has 4 grass pitches equipped with floodlights as well as an illuminating training area.
